name: Pet wars III
description:
Move using the arrow keys. Press space to shoot eggs. Press 1 to reload your egg supply. Defeat your enemies to upgrade. There is no shop, you upgrade automatically.  There is to bosses. You can shoot your companion.

Story---

You had escaped your evil owner's house with an elephant. You need to fight waves of enemies to finally escape the country. There are special upgrades dropped by your allies.  Try to defeat the jester boss to run away once and for all.

Good luck :-)
